comments.body: So we are just checking if the pids.max is applied and not actually try something that fork-bombs. right?
Correct.  No need to test cgroups, just that we set the right desired state.  This is what we do for all other resources basically.

You could use [tempSetCurrentKubeletConfig](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/test/e2e_node/util.go#L132) here to eliminate the need for this function.  It also handles reverting the config to the default for subsequent tests.
